attributes.action: Allow The Beauty/Aesthetics Industry Go Back To Work Offering All Services
attributes.additional_details:
Why should the government consider?
> We are one of the most clinical & clean industries
> PPE was already in place before covid19
> A man can get his beard cut, but a woman cannot have her top lip waxed?
> I can get my hair washed at a basin whilst a hairdresser washes over and behind me but a therapist cant work in the same position to apply lash extensions?
> I can get a drink at the pub but i cant offer my client a refreshment?
> A clean touch certified skin centre cannot open but a gym can?
attributes.background:
A petition to allow qualified & insured therapists to work in their clinical treatment rooms offering close contact services following health & safety guidance during covid19.
Take our industry seriously!
